sentences.sContent: Samuel Langhorne Clemens earned his steamboat pilot 's license.
sentences.sCn: 塞缪尔·朗荷恩·克列门斯拿到了轮船舵手执照。

sentences.sContent: Samuel Langhorne Clemens more commonly known by his pen name Mark Twain was a great American author.
sentences.sCn: 萨缪尔·兰亨·克莱门是一位伟大的美国作家，他的笔名马克·吐温更为人熟知。

trans.tranCn: 塞缪尔•兰霍恩•克莱门斯（人名）
